title: Integrated Business English Curriculum: Blended Learning-Based Practical Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business English expressions and foundational knowledge in science
context.additional_context: Blended learning in smartphone-centric limited-tech environments, combining real-time interaction during offline classes with smartphone-based asynchronous learning activities

learning_goals: Learners enhance job-related English communication skills by utilizing industry-specific professional scenarios (e.g., technical report writing, international conference presentations).
Through self-assessment and peer evaluation, learners reflectively analyze learning content and develop improvement plans.
Via project-based assessment (team business proposal development and presentation), learners demonstrate English proficiency required in real-world work environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
